com.g2mobility.xbee

Class G2BeeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.g2mobility.xbee.G2BeeActivity

  • public class G2BeeActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    Main activity of GÂ²Bee application.

    This activity uses the classic Material Design navigation drawer pattern. When a drawer item is clicked, the activity will load the corresponding fragment and display it.

    To interact with the XBee module, the activity will bind to G2BeeService at start-up. The XBee node target is selected in XBeeNodesFragment which allows to do a node discovery of the current PAN and select a XBee node, local or remote.

      • setRadioConfiguration

        public void setRadioConfiguration(RadioConfiguration configuration)
        Sets a RadioConfiguration to local cache. This is called when reading radio configurations.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the radio configuration read to set

      • getRadioConfiguration

        public RadioConfiguration getRadioConfiguration(java.lang.String parameter)
        Reports the RadioConfiguration of an AT command previously read on the selected XBee node.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the XBee device parameter
        Returns:
        the RadioConfiguration associated. The value of the radio configuration is null if it is never loaded.

      • readRadioConfigurations

        public void readRadioConfigurations()
        Reads selected XBee node's radio configurations.

      • writeValue

        public void writeValue(RadioConfiguration configuration)
        Writes parameter value to the selected XBee node.
        Parameters:
        configuration - RadioConfiguration to write

      • softwareReset

        public void softwareReset()
        Do a software reset on selected XBee node. A dialog will be showed to confirm the action.

      • restoreDefaults

        public void restoreDefaults()
        Restore selected XBee to factory defaults. Show a dialog to confirm.
